title: TEOF Systemic Receipt Envelope
description: Signature-friendly receipt envelope linking artifacts to systemic metadata.

schema_version.description: Optional semantic version for the envelope schema.

artifact.description: Canonical URI (filesystem, object storage, etc.) pointing to the artifact.

hash_sha256.description: Hex-encoded SHA-256 hash of the artifact.

issued_at.description: UTC timestamp when the receipt was generated.

expires_at.description: Optional expiration timestamp if the artifact is volatile.

systemic.description: Embedded systemic metadata describing alignment targets.

meta.description: Optional free-form metadata (e.g., build id, environment).

signature.description: Optional base64url-encoded Ed25519 signature covering the JSON body (with `signature` omitted).

public_key_id.description: Identifier for the Ed25519 public key used to verify the signature.
